member.name: T:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation
member.summary: Represents a nation-entity from the NationsList.xml

member.name: M:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation.ParseXml(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Fills the properties with the information from the given nation-XElement.
member.returns: Whether it was successul or not.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation.AvatarName
member.summary: Gets the name (path) of the nation's avatar, relative to the UserData folder.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation.Hymn
member.summary: Gets the Hymn of the Nation. Empty string for all.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the nation.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Nation.Skin
member.summary: Gets the informations for the nation's skin.

member.name: T:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.Nations
member.summary: Contains static helpers and information about the various Nations.

member.name: M:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.Nations.GetNation(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the nation-information for the nation in the given zone path.
member.param: The zone path to get the nation-information for.
member.returns: The nation-information for the given zone path.

member.name: M:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.Nations.GetNationPath(System.String)
member.summary: Takes a zone path and stript it to be only a path to the nation.

member.name: T:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin
member.summary: Represents a skin-entity that's part of the nation-entities in the NationsList.xml

member.name: M:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin.ParseXml(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Fills the properties with the information from the given skin-XElement.
member.returns: Whether it was successul or not.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin.Author
member.summary: Gets the author of the skin.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin.Collection
member.summary: Gets what collection the skin is part of.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin.Id
member.summary: Gets an identifier describing what kind of car it is.

member.name: P:ManiaNet.ManiaPlanet.XmlEntities.Skin.Name
member.summary: Gets the name (path) of the skin, relative to the UserData folder.
